daysOfMonth.description: 1 is the first day of the month and 31 is the last day of the month.

hours.description: Uses a 24-hour clock. 0 is midnight and 12 is noon.

minutes.description: 0 is the first minute of the hour — for example, 1:00 A.M.59 is the last minute of the hour — for example, 1:59 A.M.

months.description: 1 is January and 12 is December. In most cases this is set to an asterisk [*].

years.description: The standard year format. In most cases this is set to an asterisk [*].
